content_fields.desc: **Required.** A description of the audio e.g. 'Bee Gees - Stayin' Alive', or some kind of content description for accessibility e.g. 'audio attachment'.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Metadata for the audio clip referred to in ``url``.
content_fields.title: AudioInfo

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is unencrypted. The URL (typically `MXC URI`_)
to the audio clip.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is encrypted. Information on the encrypted
file, as specified in |encrypted_files|_.
content_fields.title: EncryptedFile

content_fields.desc: The duration of the audio in milliseconds.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The mimetype of the audio e.g. ``audio/aac``.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: The size of the audio clip in bytes.
content_fields.title: integer

desc: This message represents a single audio clip.
title: AudioMessage
